video.title: jQuery: AJAX - Beau teaches JavaScript
video.description:
jQuery allows you to use AJAX with a lot less code than vanilla JavaScript. Also it automatically makes your code work across different browsers. Learn all about how to use AJAX with jQuery using the load, get, and post methods.

💻 Code: https://codepen.io/beaucarnes/pen/WEZLmw?editors=1011

🐦 Beau Carnes on Twitter: https://twitter.com/carnesbeau

-
Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on technology: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

And subscribe for new programming videos every day: https://youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=freecodecamp

topLevelComment.author: tony kempson
topLevelComment.text: Nice and clear explanation. Thank you!

topLevelComment.author: Duncan Samarasinghe
topLevelComment.text: I was wondering how to do the error handling with AJAX. The status return should tell me about errors I guess. Thanks for the vid.
